Title: OpenSCAD: Buffer overflow
Synopsis:
A buffer overflow in OpenSCAD might allow remote attacker(s) to
    execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: OpenSCAD is the programmerâ€™s solid 3D CAD modeller.

Description.Text: A buffer overflow exists in OpenSCAD when parsing STL files.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted STL file using OpenSCAD, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All OpenSCAD users should upgrade to the latest version:
